name: Double Line
description:
Control :

-Player 1 : Use ' A ' key to go Left ,Use ' D ' key to go Right.

-Player 2 : Use ' <= ' (left arrow) to go Left ,Use '  => ' (right arrow) to go Right.

-Close Panel Use (escape) or (space).

This is A Local Multiplayer Game, You could play it with friends or family.
